text: Charles Yohane (26 August 1973 â€“ 14 February 2022) was a Zimbabwean footballer. He played as a midfielder. Yohane played for the Zimbabwe national football team between 1996 until 2007, making 23 appearances. Yohane was carjacked and shot dead on 14 February 2022 while working as a delivery driver in Soweto, South Africa at aged 48. ==References== Category:1973 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Zimbabwean footballers Category:Murders by firearm Category:Murdered sportspeople
title: Charles Yohane
